Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CameraIntrinsicsParametersIntrinsic parameters for a pinhole camera with plumb-bob distortion model
DepthImageDepth source where a fully dense, metric depth image is available
DepthSourceProvides depth estimates for input image pixels
FeatureMatchRepresents a single image feature matched between two camera images taken at different times
FeatureMatcherMatches features between a reference and a target image
GridKeyPointFilterPlaces features into grid cells and discards the weakest features in each cell
InitialHomographyEstimatorEstimates a rough 2D homography registering two images
IntensityDescriptorExtractorExtracts mean-normalized intensity patch around a pixel
KeyPointAn interesting point in an image
KeypointDataImage feature used for motion estimation
MotionEstimatorDoes the heavy lifting for frame-to-frame motion estimation
OdometryFrameStores data specific to an input frame
PrimeSenseCalibrationComputes useful information from a PrimeSenseCalibrationParameters object
PrimeSenseCalibrationParametersCalibration data structure for Kinect / PrimeSense sensors
PrimeSenseDepthStores depth data for a Kinect / PrimeSense camera
PyramidLevelOne level of a Gaussian image pyramid
RectificationMaps image coordinates from an input image to image coordinates on a rectified camera
SADCalculates the Sum of Absolute Deviations (SAD) score between two vectors of length descriptor_len
StereoCalibrationComputes useful information from a StereoCalibrationParameters object
StereoCalibrationParametersCalibration data structure for stereo cameras
StereoDepthStores image data for a stereo camera pair
StereoFrameStores the right-hand image for a stereo pair
